attributes.action: review the handling of all criminals granted early release.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In this country we have the Sex Offenders list which convicted sex offenders must register on. this is so the authoritys are able to keep track of them. I therefore am asking the goverment to bring out a register which all killers must sign when they are granted early release from prison. This information should be made public informing us if we are safe.
